short_summary: International Call for Information Tire Solutions
duration_in_months: , based on the tender closing date of January 15, 2023
full_summary:
**International Call for Information: Tire Solutions with Reduced Environmental Impact**
==========================

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) of the Government of Canada is hosting an International Call for Information on Tire Solutions with a Reduced Environmental Impact as part of the Greening Government Initiative’s (GGI) Greening Fleet Working Group. We invite interested parties to contribute their expertise and knowledge to this initiative.

**Overview**
----------

The Governments of Canada will accept written responses from interested parties until January 15, 2023.  Participants may provide answers or information on solving the industry-gap by proposing innovations that effectively reduce environmental impact of tires, innovate comparisons, to address other topics of interest.

**Notice Information**
-------------------

*   [Reference Number]:  WS3812809956-Doc3812872637
*   [Notice Number]: WS3812809956-RFI
*   [Publication Date]: 3 January 2023
*   [Tender Closing Date]: 15 January 2023
*   [Contracting Entity]: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   [End User Entity]: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   [Regions of Delivery]: Israel

**Communiquequi**
----------------

Please note that responses will be treated as partial property of the Governments of Canada and may be shared publicly (due to Lead Server Status/WCNGroup Share).

**Notice URL**
-------------

You can find this notice at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15032152?extsite=MTUwMzIxNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15032152?extsite=MTUwMzIxNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Additional Information**
-----------------------

For this event, tender description has been pasted in full. Propsers needing to get more information should reach out. 

Feel free to call on us if you require clarification information or need future recall-availability. Caveat: responses may be publicly shared. 

Note properties don’t preclude parties who are under review from participating. Methods and results may be shared and accredited.
